title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated readability editor agent guidelines to replace "You can" with active verbs in instructions.
Upgraded GitHub Actions (`upload-artifact`, `download-artifact`) and npm dependencies (`axios`, `glob`).
Replaced deprecated macOS-13/Ubuntu-20.04 runners with Ubuntu-24.04/macOS-26; noted `ubuntu-slim` unprivileged mode.
Added EMU organization removal restriction and preserved security defaults for new repos.
Updated Copilot models list and Visual Studio support in MCP Registry.
Configured private vulnerability reporting and edited security advisories.
Addressed Copilot survey feedback and deleted orphaned files.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated readability editor agent guidelines to replace "You can" with active verbs in instructions.
- Upgraded GitHub Actions (`upload-artifact`, `download-artifact`) and npm dependencies (`axios`, `glob`).
- Replaced deprecated macOS-13/Ubuntu-20.04 runners with Ubuntu-24.04/macOS-26; noted `ubuntu-slim` unprivileged mode.
- Added EMU organization removal restriction and preserved security defaults for new repos.
- Updated Copilot models list and Visual Studio support in MCP Registry.
- Configured private vulnerability reporting and edited security advisories.
- Addressed Copilot survey feedback and deleted orphaned files.

Update agent guidelines, dependencies, runners, and docs
